mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCH (ID, NICKNAME, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, STARTYEAR, STARTMONTH, STARTDAY, STARTHOUR, STARTMINUTE, ENDYEAR, ENDMONTH, ENDDAY, ENDHOUR, ENDMINUTE, LOCKER) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startYear}, #{startMonth}, #{startDay} ,#{startHour}, #{startMinute}, #{endYear}, #{endMonth}, #{endDay}, #{endHour}, #{endMinute}, #{locker});
